title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When following the steps in 1GEWMOZ, where a new basic project is created and a new file named 'test.xml' is added, the scripted resource editor example is set as the default editor for XML files. Selecting 'test.xml' in the Navigator and then choosing 'Open With...' followed by selecting 'Default Text Editor' results in no changes; the scripted resource editor example is still the active editor and the content of the XML file is not displayed.
EB: After selecting 'Default Text Editor' in the 'Open With...' dialog, a new editor should open for the 'test.xml' file with the proper text editor, displaying the content of the XML file.
SR:
1. Create a new basic project
2. Create a new file named 'test.xml'
3. Set the scripted resource editor example as the default editor for XML files
4. Select 'test.xml' in the Navigator
5. Choose 'Open With...'
6. Select 'Default Text Editor'
7. Observe that a new editor should open for the 'test.xml' file, displaying the content of the XML file
